features: SUPERIOR CLEANING: Microfiber Mop Head Refill, made of high-quality microfiber, this triangular mop head ensures superior cleaning. It easily removes stains and stubborn dirt from the floor, keeping your home environment clean and tidy.

PERFECT COMPATIBILITY: This mop head is perfectly compatible with O-Ceda EasyWring Spin Mop 1-Tank system, note ⚠️ not compatible with O-Ceda EasyWring Spin Mop 2-Tank system, by replacing the original mop head, you can continue to enjoy your The convenience and efficiency of a mop system.

Multi-purpose application: The swivel mop head is not only suitable for household floor cleaning, this mop head can also be used in various application scenarios such as car washing. Whether it's household cleaning or vehicle care, it helps you get the job done.

DURABLE AND RELIABLE: Microfiber mop refill made of durable material, this triangular mop head has excellent durability. You can use it multiple times and it can be easily cleaned by machine washing to prolong its life.

Affordable: With four mop heads per pack, this configuration is very affordable. Not only can you enjoy high-quality cleaning results, but you can also have multiple spare spin mop heads to ensure that your long-term cleaning needs are met.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Product Description It includes 4 replacement mop heads, each microfiber mop head lasts up to 3 months of use, which not only saves you time and money, but also provides you with the convenience of cleaning and cleaning, which is exactly what you need in a quality cleaning partner!

Reusable mop head This value pack contains 4 refills, refills last up to 3 months! Mop heads are replaced for longer lasting durability, saving time and money. Ultra Fine Microfiber Our replacement mop heads are made of microfiber, which is highly absorbent and durable, effortlessly sweeping up stubborn stains and can do an effective job of cleaning. Machine washable This microfiber mop head is machine washable, use cold water when machine washing. It is recommended to replace the mop head refill every 3 months for optimal floor cleaning. Suitable for all types of floors This microfiber rotary mop refill safely and effectively cleans stains on hard floors, including hardwood, laminate, tile, vinyl, linoleum and more. Perfect Fit The perfect replacement mop head compatible with O Ceda rotary mop system, you deserve it! NOTE: For use with 1-Tank mop systems only

Unlike traditional mop buckets, it is ideal for mopping all hard floor surfaces without bending over or getting your hands wet. Effectively prevents water from spilling out of the mop bucket when mopping. Do not hurt your hands, simply use the built-in foot pedal for hands-free wringing.

JUST THE MOP HEAD YOU NEED Machine Washable Our Spin Mop Replacement Heads are machine washable and reusable, machine wash in cold water and loosen as you wash. 100% Microfiber Spin mop replacement head is made of 100% microfiber, the material is soft and clean, easy to clean dirt and dust, will not scratch the floor, better cleaning results.These mop replacement heads are made of microfiber material for higher density and better quality. It is super absorbent and brings you a streak-free floor. Compatible with EasyWring mops Installation is as easy as the original product, when installing make sure the three corners of the mop head refill are fully seated on the mop base and you hear a "click" sound, otherwise it may fall off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best general use mop
reviews.reviewText: This is the best general use mop I have ever used. It sure makes cleaning a lot easier. I’ve even washed ceilings and walls with it. It’s really good and my regular handle fit right in there so no point on having multiple handles

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I didn't believe I was going to like this
reviews.reviewText: These are some great mop heads somebody gave me one of these mop head buckets and the holder for the mop heads so I order these and try them out and they're really really good they actually dry up the floor faster when I'm up with these and the best part I can throw it in the washing machine and clean it out so I say money right there

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Worth a try!
reviews.reviewText: The mop head gets very heavy once you dunk them in the water. Need to spin them out well. Otherwise, they seem to mop well, they fit perfectly and seem to be a savings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get the job done
reviews.reviewText: I love these refills, they last and do the job!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I tried some less expensive mop heads that were supposed to work with my O’Cedar mop but they kept falling off. Theses stay on and are great for mopping.
